description: Contains information about updates to patient demographic info.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REG_DEM_CHNG_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the UTC instant that an audited demographic item was changed.

columns.name: REG_DEM_CHNG_ITEM
columns.description: Stores the source demographic item when that item's value changes. Used for auditing purposes.

columns.name: REG_DEM_CHNG_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique ID of the user who is responsible for changing the value of an audited demographic item.
